data.oai_dc:dc: mortality depending on temperature in common garden experiment

Mortality data (in percentage) measured on two replicates (A and B) of C. riparius population in between 2 different generation (3 and 5) at different development time (after 48h of experiment and at adult stage) during a common garden experiment with transplantation involving temperature. The mortality is reported depending on raising temperature, treatment temperature, temperature variation populations were subjected to (raising temperature - treatment temperature) and the egg clutch individuals came from.
